TopicTitle: Des mechjeb allow coding of movements?

Articles.Content:
Does Mechjeb allow scripting or ai control of a vessel? I want to have them scripted so I only need to record and move the camera. 

Like go up or something like nodes and do the bd armory guard mode?
Not really, except for a few "pre defined scripts". If you wish to add scripting and "ai", there is a special mod for that purpose: kOS.
